H0.text: Who was appointed Chief Constable of Merseyside in 2004, and left the post in 2009, after being made an "Inspector of Constabulary" by the Queen?". Bernard Hogan-Howe's predecessor, Norman Bettison

H1.text: Who was appointed Chief Constable of Merseyside in 2004, and left the post in 2009, after being made an "Inspector of Constabulary" by the Queen?". Peter Fahy

H2.text: Who was appointed Chief Constable of Merseyside in 2004, and left the post in 2009, after being made an "Inspector of Constabulary" by the Queen?". Stephen House

H3.text: Who was appointed Chief Constable of Merseyside in 2004, and left the post in 2009, after being made an "Inspector of Constabulary" by the Queen?". Hogan-Howe
